show.title: Pallavar Varalaru
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/dKU93t
show.description: Pallavargal intha Tamil mannai aanda kathai namakku theriyum. Avanga epperpatta aatchiyai nadathunanga, entha maathiriyaana valarchi ellaam kondu vanthaanga, Pallava mannargaloda kalai aarvam eppadi pattathu ? , ithellam therinjukka intha puthagam ungalukku uthaviyaa irukkum. Vaanga Pallavar kaalathai nokki oru payanam seivom.
show.description_secondary: Pallavargal intha Tamil mannai aanda kathai namakku theriyum. Avanga epperpatta aatchiyai nadathunanga, entha maathiriyaana valarchi ellaam kondu vanthaanga, Pallava mannargaloda kalai aarvam eppadi pattathu ? , ithellam therinjukka intha puthagam ungalukku uthaviyaa irukkum. Vaanga Pallavar kaalathai nokki oru payanam seivom.

author.name: Shafin Prem
author.bio: delivering the best in your feed
